steps.title: Step 1: Creating a Scratch Org
steps.body:
We are going to create a new 'Scratch Org', which is an ephemeral dev environnement.
We will use it to creare our app, but also to experience how Salesforce DX allows collaboratoive development, Continuous Integration and Continous Deployment.

steps.title: Step 2: Data Model
steps.body:
Follow the instructions to create the data model yourself in your org.
Then you can finalize the model by pushing the metadata defined here.

steps.title: Step 3: Data Import
steps.body:
We created a data model for our app.
It's still better to test with a little more data!
Have a look at the data we will load, in JSON format here .

steps.title: Step 4: User Interface Customization
steps.body:
You have now been able to test a first version of the application! Hooray!
What if we added a little collaboration?
We could also create more sexy lists views and custom page layouts.
Let's get to work!
Final metadata here
